content:
The biggest problem with CVE-2016-10229 remote UDP code execution is all the routers and Android phones that will NEVER receive a patch.

Mirai guessed baked in passwords. Wait for the apocalypse that will unfold as soon as a PoC exploit against that CVE emerges.

https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-10229

content:
Porcupine Tree - The Sound of Musak (http://y2u.be/hp0OXICuZek)

Hear the sound of music
Drifting in the aisles
Elevator Prozac
Stretching on for miles

The music of the future
Will not entertain
It's only meant to repress
And neutralise your brain

Soul gets squeezed out
Edges get blunt
Demographic
Gives what you want

One of the wonders of the world is going down
It's going down I know
It's one of the blunders of the world that no-one cares
No-one cares enough

(No CW - be too off message)
